title: [Large-Scale] ICT-Based Job Competency Enhancement Program for Social Sector Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary social research methodologies and experience with ICT device usage
context.additional_context: A training program for working professionals aimed at strengthening data analysis and report-writing skills in the social sector using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can collect, analyze, and visualize quantitative data in social fields using ICT tools and create reports.
Learners can design and execute team-based social problem-solving projects using digital collaboration platforms.
Learners can establish self-directed learning strategies in ICT-integrated educational environments and evaluate digital literacy competencies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
